page.title: 15Recreation in Alburgh
page.content:
{ Recreation
In the grounds of the village hall are tennis courts,a large playing field and childrens play area, all available to the village community to use. Many other hobbies and passtimes are enjoyed by the residents ranging from active sport,hockey,rugby football, tennis badminton, to gardening, walking reading fishing shotting mending china sailing knitting and sewing. Computers are playing an important roll in youg people free time, both in playing computer games and making their own programs. The library van calls in the village once a month and there is a branch library in Harleston.
